resources.string: users in the Care Together network
According to your saved data, You are not close contact with confirm users

✺ CareTogether has never been associated with someone with confirm users on your phone. 
 
✺ You will be notified if someone you are connected to becomes a confirmed patient. 
 
✺ We encourage you to stay in your home as much as possible to continue this situation.
You need Internet Connection to acquire the information of people who have been quarantined or treated as positive patients
You need Internet connection to access the relevant information.
Please turn on your bluetooth and GPS to connect with other users
Please give permission to store/achieve your data locally
Please change your file permission option in the setting to proceed
Your location sharing is currently disabled
Please give permission to share your location. Data will be saved in your local storage
You have not yet connected to any positive patients within Care Together network
1. Please help prevent the spread of virus by staying home
2. Please wear a mask if you must leave home
3. Please follow the guidelines of the Ministry of Health and Sports
4. If you have been in contact with a confirmed patient, please contact the emergency contact urgently
Fake news are rampant on Facebook and prey on people\'s fears. Therefore, we advise you to read the following reliable news sources and facebook pages:
Will You delete the data stored for controlling Covid-19 from your phone ?
You can only send your data when you are in the area of designated hospital
